title: Himi 212
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko e me’a ia Sīsū,
‘Oku tau kau taha
‘O ma’u ‘a e fiefia,
Mo e nekeneka.
2.
Ko e nekeneka ia,
‘Oku ‘ikai ‘ilo
‘E he kakai fakamaama,
Pea ta’e liliu.
3.
Ko e fiefia ia,
Ta’efa’alaua,
Ko e fua ‘oku tupu,
‘I hotau ‘Otua.
4.
Pea kapau ‘oku pehē,
Hono lelei lahi
‘O ‘etau feohi, mo e
‘Eiki, ‘i lalo ni:
5.
‘E fefē hono lahi fau
‘O e fiefia,
Te tau ‘ilo, ‘i he’etau
Hoko ki ‘olunga?
6.
Pea fakafetaulaki,
Pea kātoa ai
Ki hono taloni lelei,
‘Oku ‘Afio ai. *
